Text: Out of Africa:  The book, first published in 1937, recounts events of the seventeen years when Blixen made her home in Kenya, then called British East Africa.
Triplets:<Out of Africa

Text: Out of Africa:  The book has sometimes been published under the author's pen name, Isak Dinesen.
